New Records: Shubman Gill hit his maiden T20I century, scoring 126 not out off 63 balls.
India achieved their biggest-ever win in terms of runs in T20Is, defeating New Zealand by 168 runs.
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill scored an unbeaten 126 off 63 balls, including 12 fours and seven sixes.
India defeated New Zealand by 168 runs in the third T20I to win the series 2-1.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's second highest margin of victory in T20Is was a 143-run win over Ireland in Dublin in 2018.
